Description: 1 x improvement notice - 4714615.1 - (312367542) You have not ensured that the exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely respirable crystalline silica, is monitored in accordance with a suitable procedure (a) at regular intervals and (b) when any change occurs which may affect exposure. Therefore you are not ensuring, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare at work of your employees.
